title: Meet me in the stars ART
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> This was originally made as part of SCP for Corgo. I was one of the art donors and I was lucky enough to get such a cool request. I was asked to create a diagram that mimicked a old scientific journal thus I created this. FIND THE STORY HERE: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7999 Meet me in the stars]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Aart-of-dr-asteria/Meet%20in%20the%20stars]]
